Schedule Advising Appointments through OneDePaul. Bio and Research Information Eli T. Brown is an Assistant Professor in the College of Computing and Digital Media (CDM) at DePaul University. He earned his B.A. from Cornell University in Computer Science and Math, and his Ph.D. and M.S. in Computer Science from Tufts University. His teaching is focused in the Data Science Program, where he teaches data visualization and machine learning. His research revolves around integrating the two disciplines together for more effective data analytics. He directs the Laboratory for Interactive Human-Computer Analytics (LIHCA; lihca.io), which develops new interactive machine learning technology to address the needs of collaborators in a variety of fields including biomedical, biotechnology and journalism.
